name: Contentful Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Contentful Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Contentful API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Contentful API | (必填项)

source.name: source
source.description: Pick where your data comes from, delivery or preview API
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Pick where your data comes from, delivery or preview API | 默认值: deliveryApi

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: entry

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll

environmentId.name: environmentId
environmentId.description: The ID for the Contentful environment (e.g. master, staging, etc.). Depending on your plan, you might not have environments. In that case use "master".
environmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Environment ID | 作用: The ID for the Contentful environment (e.g. master, staging, etc.). Depending on your plan, you might not have environments. In that case use "master". | 默认值: master

contentTypeId.name: contentTypeId
contentTypeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content Type ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: equal (值: None) - Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.
exclude (值: None) - Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[nin]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.
exist (值: None) - Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[exists]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.
select (值: None) - The select operator allows you to choose what fields to return from an entity. You can choose multiple values by combining comma-separated operators.
include (值: None) - Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[in]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.
notEqual (值: None) - Search for all data that matches the condition: {attribute}[ne]={value}. Attribute can use dot notation.

order (值: None) - You can order items in the response by specifying the order search parameter. You can use sys properties (such as sys.createdAt) or field values (such as fields.myCustomDateField) for ordering.
query (值: None) - Full-text search is case insensitive and might return more results than expected. A query will only take values with more than 1 character.
rawData (值: None) - Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

entryId.name: entryId
entryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entry ID | (必填项)

assetId.name: assetId
assetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Asset ID | (必填项)
